name: Answers - SCORM Compliant LMS
short_description: Answers from Results International (www.resultsinternational.com) is a Learning Management System, based on the latest SCORM standards.  Answers supports far more of the SCORM Data-Model than any of the 'big-name' LMS's, although is more light-weight
